title: it is dumb...
review: Cgi and bad words.that's all it has for well it. The clown is nothing.the old it was way far better.some may like this movie but after 5 minutes was ready to leave. The only reason this movie is great right now is because there is no other movie out there.this penny wise is good but the last movie that pennywise was great.using bad words in a movie is just some thing that I really don't need to heard every 10 minutes in this movie
